scripts.test:dev: NETWORK=Custom ENVIRONMENT=Development PROVIDER=Emulator bun test && echo OK
scripts.test:int: docker-compose ls | grep 'yaci-devkit.*running' 2>&1 >/dev/null && NETWORK=Custom ENVIRONMENT=Integration PROVIDER=KupmiosV5 bun test --timeout 600000
scripts.build: esbuild --target=esnext  --bundle src/runtime/index.ts --format=iife --platform=browser --global-name=BUN_RUNTIME > src/runtime.out.js; cat src/runtime.footer.js >> src/runtime.out.js
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && cd test && bun run typecheck
